articles.title: Trump Rule Would Overhaul Landmark Environmental Law - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration wants to ease approval for major infrastructure projects. It could mean federal agencies won't need to consider climate impacts of things like pipelines and highways.
articles.content:
The Trump administration wants to overhaul a major environmental law - the National Environmental Policy Act - to help speed approval of infrastructure projects, including oil and gas pipelines.
Jim Mone/AP
Federal agencies may not have to consider climate … [+4395 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Mystery bug behind China's pneumonia outbreak identified: What to know - NBCNews.com
articles.description: People in Wuhan, a Chinese city, have been infected with pneumonia. The cause was unknown, prompting fears of SARS. The virus has been identified as a coronavirus.
articles.content:
BEIJING Since late last year, people in the central Chinese city of Wuhan have been infected with a viral pneumonia whose cause was unknown. The outbreak raised the specter of another SARS epidemic, which killed hundreds in 2002 and 2003.

articles.title: America has turned its back on big department stores - CNN
articles.description: Somehow, in the midst of a monster holiday shopping season, America's biggest department stores managed to lose sales. Despite several attempts to revamp their images, department stores have gotten the cold shoulder from shoppers.
